title.rendered: Tastebudz Forbidden Fruitz Strain Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
Tastebudz Forbidden Fruitz Auto Strain: Autoflowering Feminized Seeds
(Grape Gushers Strain x Zkittlez Strain)

🍇 A Fruitful Indulgence: Tastebudz Forbidden Fruitz strain is a vibrant fusion of Grape Gushers and Zkittlez Auto, delivering waves of juicy sweetness and zesty fruit intensity. Each puff transports you through a tropical orchard of bold, exotic flavours — a true taste experience for flavour chasers.

🍃 Bountiful Harvests Made Simple: This Indica-rich beauty is a delight, promising dense and trichome-laden buds with only 8-9 weeks flowering time. Enjoy an impressive indoor yield of up to 650 g/m^2, and for outdoors, 600 g/plant.

🌞 A Potent Escape: Forbidden Fruitz transcends the ordinary with its 25% THC level, weaving a complex and enduring tapestry of effects that captivate both body and mind, offering a blissful retreat from the mundane.

🍹 A Complex Terpene Profile: With a rich array of terpenes including beta caryophyllene, alpha humulene, limonene, linalool, alpha pinene, and more, this strain boasts a sour grapefruit flavour intertwined with tropical fruit candies, creating a symphony of tastes.

🏆 Premium Autoflowering Seeds: Choosing Forbidden Fruitz Auto means opting for seeds that combine top-notch genetics with easy cultivation, ideal for both beginners and experienced growers alike, looking for an indica dominant strain. part of the Tastebudz Seeds Auto Mix pack.

🌱 Quality with Conscience: In adherence to Cannabis Seeds UK laws, Tastebudz offers these seeds as collectible souvenirs only. Each seed is a symbol of commitment to genetic preservation.

 

🌈 Description

The Forbidden Fruitz strain by Tastebudz Syndicate is a bold, flavour-driven autoflower that stands out in any seed collection. A potent cross between Grape Gushers and Zkittlez Auto Exotic Fruit, this strain delivers compact, resin-loaded buds packed with exotic terpenes. The Forbidden Fruitz strain offers both speed and strength, making it a top pick for collectors looking to add a fast-finishing, high-impact auto to their library.

🍬 Flavour & Aroma

Bursting with tropical fruit candy notes, sour citrus, and a whisper of earthy sweetness, the Forbidden Fruitz strain lives up to its name with every inhale. Its fruity flavour profile is as loud as its genetics — a vibrant standout for anyone chasing rare and terp-rich seeds.

⚡ Potency & Effects

Clocking in at up to 25% THC, the Forbidden Fruitz strain leans 60% Indica, delivering a smooth yet long-lasting effect. Ideal for deep relaxation and evening use, its high is both mentally calming and physically grounding — perfect for those who appreciate a strain that brings balance and depth.

🧬 Seed Collector’s Note

As an autoflowering feminized variety, the Forbidden Fruitz strain is well-suited to both seasoned seed collectors and those building their first library. Its stable structure, unique lineage, and flavour-forward expression make it a go-to for anyone curating standout seeds with bold genetics. Want More ? Check out our Best Yielding Cannabis Strains 2024 Blog!

 

Legal Note:

Please remember that Tastebudz Forbidden Fruitz Auto Strain Autoflowering Seeds are sold as collectible souvenirs, in full compliance with U.K. laws. Each seed is a masterpiece of breeding, crafted for those who appreciate the art and science of cannabis genetics.
